content: @Lloyd McKenzie I saw your post about work opportunities from the Israel FHIR community -- is there a reason for using #Announcements versus #work opportunities ? I'm asking because I would like to make an announcement about a new position open on my team at Microsoft, and I want to make sure I am following the same rules as everyone else :smile:
Probably because my brain didn't categorize it as "work opportunity". My bad. Should I re-post in the correct stream?

No, I'm not asking for that. But sure, I think it's good for folks whomonitoring there. I wouldn't take down the post you already made, but maybe follow up with a quick note that in the future these items will be in the work opportunity stream and people should subscribe there.
Might be best if I just did a 'move'?
Oh good call, with the "leave a link in the old spot" option
